## BasePlot.setSelectCallback() method

Set a callback function that will be invoked when a sample is clicked

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSelectCallback(fn: (sample: ISample) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | (sample: [ISample](./composition-plot.isample.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | A callback function to be invoken upon selection of a sample |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
